3D Scanning Atlas

Comparison of 3D scanners by object

The 3D Scanning Data Atlas is powered by the Potree Viewer and is hosted by UCLA.
See the figure below for instructions on using the viewer.

Below are the OBJs produced for each of the nine objects:
